name: Motocross Wheelie King
summary:
Race through the desert and do as many wheelies as you can until the wheels of your motocross fall off. Tap and hold the screen to do a wheelie and release to lower. Just don't let your front wheel touch the ground!
Addictive one tap endless racing action with 10 different bikes to unlock. Every Motocross has its special abilities. Unlock them all and be the King of the Wheelie. Compete with your friends and the world on the Game Center leaderboard. Share your score and brag to your friends!
